entry.title: WIND WARNING , Ucluelet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:55 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.2°C

entry.title: Monday night: Wet flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Wet flurries beginning this evening and ending after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm and hail this evening and after midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 80 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 50 gusting to 70 early this evening then to 30 gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
